date.headline: View of NCT00000201 on 2005_06_23
date.text:
ClinicalTrials Identifier:NCT00000201
Updated:2005_06_23

Descriptive Information
Brief title

Pharmacological Modulation of Cocaine Effects - 1
Official title

Pharmacological Modulation of Cocaine Effects
Brief summary

The purpose of this study is to conduct human laboratory studies of possible cocaine interactions with various potential treatment medications.
Detailed description

PhasePhase 2
Study typeInterventional
Study designTreatment
Condition Cocaine-Related Disorders
Intervention
Drug: Selegiline

Recruitment Information
Status Completed
End date 2001-12
Criteria

Healthy volunteersNo
